    Home

    Welcome to my homespage! I am seeking 22Fall Ms/Ph.D Position in Control and Learning, please do not hesitate to drop me an email if you are intersted in me.

    News

    Jun.2021, I am taking an exciting journey at Estimation, Modeling and Analysis Group at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology as a visiting student and this visit will last for half one year. Thanks a lot for the host of Prof. Meriem!

    About me

    I am a Visiting Student at Estimation, Modeling and Analysis Group and Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology.

    I was also a research intern working in Multi-Agent Robotic Motion Lab of Department of Mechanical Engineering at National University of Singapore.

    I will obtain my B.Eng in Automation in Jun. 2022 at Northeastern University. I also worked closely with Prof. Fei Chen from State Key Laboratory of Synthetical Automation for Process Industries at Northeastern University in China.

    Previous Position

    Teaching Assistant, Nonlinear Systems, Northeastern University, Mar.2021 - Jul.2021

    Research Assistant, Autonoumous Networks and Control Laboratory, Northeastern University, Oct.2018 - Feb.2021
